Follow or unfollow a user with ID '987654321'
Begin!

It seems I've been given a task that doesn't match the utilities available to me. I have two tools related to SQUAKE, useful for calculating carbon emissions, possibly not relevant for user management tasks such as following or unfollowing users. 

Because the task is out of context with the tools provided, I should call Finish to give up and restart, acknowledging mismatch of task and tools. I will call the appropriate function now.

Calling: Finish with virtual function: give_up_and_restart.
